in_ports.name: map_buffer_id
in_ports.hint: ID of some existing map buffer.

out_ports.caption: stitching map (reindexing table)
out_ports.name: stitching_map
out_ports.hint: Reindexing table for all stitched objects.

out_ports.caption: partial objects
out_ports.name: partial_set
out_ports.hint:
Table of partial (delayed) objects: 0 for completed, 1 for partial..
Note: this information is available only for buffers in "Stitching labels" mode."

out_ports.caption: raw partial objects
out_ports.name: raw_partial_set
out_ports.hint: Raw version of "partial objects" (without reindexing). Can be used for debugging.

out_ports.caption: object pairs
out_ports.name: object_pairs
out_ports.hint:
List of all correlated object pairs.
Note: this information is available only for buffers in "Stitching labels" mode."

out_ports.caption: number of objects
out_ports.name: number_of_objects
out_ports.hint:
Current number of objects: B or B+1, where B is the last re-indexing base.
It will be B+1 if the map buffer was created with the flag "Zeros are reserved for background", or B if that flag was not set.
Note: this information is available only for buffers, created in "Auto-reindexing labels" mode.

controls.caption: Indexing base of stitching map
controls.name: indexingBase
controls.description:
Indexing base of result map. If this value B is non-zero, it just means that the first element is removed from the result array. In other words, two objects with labels L1 and L2 correlates (considered to be the same object), when map[L1−B]=map[L2−B], where B is this base (0 or 1).
The value 1 can be convenient, if the map buffer was created with the flag "Zeros are reserved for background".
